member.name: IProcessInitControl.ResetInitializerTimeout
member.param: The number of seconds after this method is called before process initialization times out.
member.returns: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_OUTOFMEMORY, E_UNEXPECTED, E_FAIL, and S_OK.

member.name: IProcessInitControl
member.summary: Specifies the process initialization time-out interval.
